techs.name: Sector Intel
techs.quote: 'Intels obtained from the sector, you may start issuing your research priority commands.' - Transmission Voice

techs.name: Nebulogy
techs.quote: 'These Gasses can be potent of life, simple chemistries able to be harvested to food, should you give the cue.' - Transmission Voice

techs.name: Habitation
techs.quote: 'This should make one person live, at a time.' - Head Engineer Yarkov

techs.name: Mineralogy
techs.quote: 'Nearby Asteroids are now surface scanned and has showed promising resources for further developements.' - Transmission Voice
